```{r}
l_sigma = summary(m_lakes)$sigma
XtX = t(model.matrix(m_lakes))%*%model.matrix(m_lakes)
XtX.inv = solve(XtX)
XtX.inv
```


```{r}
Sigma = l_sigma * l_sigma * XtX.inv
Sigma
```
```{r}
sd = sqrt(diag(Sigma))
print(l_sigma*sqrt(XtX.inv[2,2]))
sd
```

